1.0.name: wordpress/fred-at-a-glance
1.0.description: The FRED widget (http://research.stlouisfed.org/fred2/) was created to allow you to show the six of the most popular economic data series from the FRED database in the sidebar of your blog. The widget includes the FRED logo, a link to the webpage for each series, the latest value for each series, and a small trend line chart for each series. View our Terms of Use at http://research.stlouisfed.org/fred-addin/legal.html
